######## Question 8

The next step in our analysis is to explore some correlations in the data set. First, the relationship between the length and width of the sepals, which is slightly negative with a magnitude of `r round(cor(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width),2)`. On the other hand, between the length and width of the petals there is a strong  positive correlation ( r = `r round(cor(iris$Petal.Length, iris$Petal.Width), 2)`).

######## Question 9

```{r plotsepal, echo=FALSE, fig.cap = 'Association between length and width of Sepals', fig.alt = ' Graph 1'}
plot(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width)
```
